name: steal 50 shades of grey
description:
this is a chaser style game where your favorite book betrays you and attacks you. 

Sandbox edition:

-Sandbox edition is finally out! 

-The controls are normal but the higher the speed, the slower you become

press 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9 to go through the extra skins

Press T to make the guy say stuff (be creative! or not)

Controls:

when the game starts the choking kid should follow your cursor to stay away from the book if you touch it then you lose and if you lose, just refresh the game.
